name: Robot Fly
description:
Robot Fly is a flying game with a new concept that a robot changes into a car or a plane.

When upgrading all kinds of accessories and items for your robot and pilot, you can make your robot much stronger.


+ 6 Stages
+ 6 kinds of great bosses and 50 kinds of enemies
+ 3 kinds of robots
+ 3 kinds of pilots
+ Various accessories (boosters, wheels and rockets and so on)
+ 3 kinds of bases and launchers
+ 3 kinds of escaping methods
+ Transformed into a car or a plane
+ Various kinds of items
+ Various kinds of obstacles
